message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95.
I can see you're trying to get a good deal, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $105, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can we meet at $92.50?
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to compromise at $107.50, but that's the lowest I can go.
